      • getAPolDescriptor

        double getAPolDescriptor()
        Returns:
        Sum of the atomic polarizabilities (including implicit hydrogens). This class need explicit hydrogens.

      • getZagrebIndexDescriptor

        double getZagrebIndexDescriptor()
